It’s common knowledge that Candy Crush Saga has taken over the world. This Match Three puzzle game is more than an addictive mobile/PC pastime – it’s a movement. If any of you fans of Candy Crush Saga out there are looking for similar games, we’re here to help (or harm) you by providing more time wasters. These 15 mobile/PC puzzle games offer that same “so-hard-to-put-down” aspect that will keep most of you gamers to keep coming back for more. 
Keep in mind – all of these games and Candy Crush Saga owes its very existence to Shariki . 
Prepare to waste even more of your smartphone’s battery life and stare at your computer screen for hours on end. These games are perfect for Candy Crush Saga players. 15. Bejeweled 
This Match Three OG should be familiar to anyone who’s played an addictive puzzle game. This initial installment in the series tasks players with matching a bunch of crystals and jewels for big scoring opportunities. If you like Bejeweled , then you might as well go ahead and play Bejeweled 2 , Bejeweled Twist , Bejeweled Blitz and Bejeweled 3 . 14. The Treasure of Montezuma 3 
The tribal culture provides the main visual backdrop for this colorful puzzler. The third game in this series of puzzlers is packed with power-up’s that are sure to push you to a massive final score. The tight time limit will keep your fingers active, so go ahead and download this puzzler. Pay some respects to The Treasures of Montezuma 3 .
